mistral:7b-instruct: The selected EPO plan from Queensland Country Health offers comprehensive coverage tailored to your health profile with multiple chronic conditions including hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, and stroke. Key benefits such as hospitalization coverage, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care align with the medical needs you've been diagnosed with. The $500,000 coverage provides significant financial protection for potential health complications. Although it has a monthly premium of $300 and a deductible of $2500, the overall out-of-pocket maximum of $6500 helps cap your costs in case of multiple medical events within a year. This plan balances coverage needs with affordability for individuals in the middle income bracket while excluding elective cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments to minimize unnecessary expenses.
